actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill relating to approval of certain matters pertaining to the Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Bicentennial Civic Center.

summary.text: Provides that the approval by the Senate and House committees required under Public Law 92-520 pertaining to the Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Bicentennial Civic Center in the District of Columbia shall be deemed to have been given.

titles.title: A bill relating to approval of certain matters pertaining to the Dwight D. Eisenhower Memorial Bicentennial Civic Center.
